prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that has a playful demeanor and a mischievous grin.
Imagine a purple spectral creature with floating hands and glowing eyes, perfect for haunting.
Show me a Pokemon with a ghostly aura and sharp claws, capable of terrifying opponents.
Generate a spooky Pokemon with a shadowy form and an eerie laugh that echoes in the dark.
Design a dual-type Pokemon that embodies both ghostly and poison elements, with a haunting appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that can blend into shadows, with a sleek and agile body for stealth attacks.
Make a ghost-type Pokemon that can float above the ground, with a mysterious and playful personality.
